ISSUE.TITLE: User is not logged in after registring
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.60.2 (can be reproduced on our demo website as well) Details are described at https://www.nopcommerce.com/en/boards/topic/96680/bug-in-nopcommerce-4602-user-is-not-logged-in-after-registring

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #6591 Fixed grouping in the return request accessibility get method

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #4987 #6670 Ignore millisecond on compare datetime during checking need of re-login after password changing
